actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize an appropriation of $300 million to provide famine and disaster relief, rehabilitation, and reconstruction assistance to the Sahelian nations of Africa.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Foreign Assistance Act, to be appropriated, in addition to funds otherwise available, $300,000,000 for use by the President for famine and disaster relief, rehabilitation, and reconstruction assistance in connection with the drought in the Sahelian nations of Africa.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize an appropriation of $300 million to provide famine and disaster relief, rehabilitation, and reconstruction assistance to the Sahelian nations of Africa.
